forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers this morning, then cloudy with rain likely during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the morning will give way to steady rain this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
